attributes.action: Stop employers advertising for jobs that are over 48 hours a week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is supposed to be against the law for employees to be forced to work over 48 hours a week yet employers are still getting away with advertising jobs that are over this amount.
How can this be right if it is supposed to be optional to work over 48 hours?
